Summary: Observed an unidentified object while parked at the Safeway parking lot In San Mateo, CA
divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting in my car with my kids when I decided to tape a jet far away leaving a beautiful jet stream. A bright object appeared 5 seconds into the video - the object appeared out of nowhere and headed north at a very high speed. Not sure if it was a meteorite or something else!
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in San Mateo
There were no other sightings in San Mateo on or around April 14th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
